name: Anonymous
comment:
>>38209657
I'm a little worried that a constant diet of acid-bugs is going to make this thing an acid-frog given how other amphibians like poison dart frogs work.

That, or he's just got a cast-iron stomach.

Make damn sure Aelriss' bird doesn't decide to take flight in this room; if the toad seems capable of locating and eating stuff even while asleep, I don't think it's wise to risk that reflex with other delicious airborne treats.
